reviewText: Gospel 4 pack, bought it for the last brickmaker, which is an excellent DVD, great for family viewing. I would recommend this video for a family viewing night
My favorite film on this DVD was "The Last Brickmaker in America" with Sidney Poitier. Wow, It is a very moving story and Poitier is such a great actor.  It was very, very good.
Good DVD if you love gospel music,  there is music in all four with Tyler Perry's 2 being on stage plays.

I bought the pack for The Last BrickMaker in America and the other three were just a bonus.  The other three were nice, but the Last Brickmaker was everything one would expect from a Sidney Poitier movie.  I and my son enjoyed thoroughly.  But if you are wanting any extra footage, spend the extra money for the movie alone as there are NO EXTRAs included. A very nice family movie, The Last Brickmaker,  and one than can be used to bring a broken family back together.
Wonderful family movie! Excellent dialogue and expression of values!! Pure and clean!!!
the last brick maker is great
Item delivered on time, was as described.
